Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to the confinement of incarcerated individuals under the age of eighteen
Summary: Relates to the confinement of incarcerated individuals under the age of eighteen who shall not be placed in segregated confinement for any reason.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to the confinement of incarcerated individuals under the age of eighteen
